Barry Lyndon

Rank: 690


An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.


Director: Stanley Kubrick

Writer: Stanley Kubrick, William Makepeace Thackeray

Stars: Ryan ONeal", Marisa Berenson, Patrick Magee

Tags: Adventure Epic, Costume Drama, Dark Comedy, Epic, Globetrotting Adventure, Period Drama, Political Drama, Psychological Drama, Tragedy, Adventure
